ygData.subject: RE: Making Plat
ygData.msgSnippet: pretty pathetic, i was wearing my sr apprentice robe until level 27 when i actually went in najena myself and got it by killing her. Veldra Rae`lynn lvl 43
ygData.messageBody:
pretty pathetic, i was wearing my sr apprentice robe until level 27 when i
actually went in najena myself and got it by killing her.

Veldra Rae`lynn
lvl 43 magician
Veeshan


-----Original Message-----
From: Omeg Felligan [mailto:omeg_felligan@...]
Sent: Monday, November 08, 1999 12:33 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Making Plat


From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>

hehehe, whatever I'm doing invloves hanging out in the bank and eventually a
high level caster will see a young one so they want to help, give you stuff,
and then you sell it for the money (or keep it if you want it :).

I have a few scemes...first I'm in Qeynos already so I'm going to gather a
bunch of Gold Ear Studs (as many as I feel like camping for) then run over
to the faydarks (stop in steamfont on the way for spiderling silk). Then
sell off the earrings about as far from Qeynos as you can get, sell the
spiderling silk to bards (it's a quest there) and repeat the silk thing.
that might work. I donno.

Thanks for the help I'll give those batwings a try I think... :)

Thanks,
Omeg
